the cr 
> chamber. Tactics
>

chamber:: just

snake is to 
> cut off the head and make sure its dead. The lights are off in the 
arc and 
> hellbeast has take his vantage there so.
> 
> Liono: ::Maximize:: I get it one


> Tigerhawk: ::beastMode:: get on 
> Liono: I hate doing this ::climb on TigerHawks back::  Ready on 3
> Tigerhawk: 3 ::Tigerhawk Charges into the arc.::
> Liono: can you still do starDust?

As Fracturcon makes his way slowly towards the Ark he notices 
Tigerhawk charging into the Ark with Liono on his back.  "This is too 
much", Fracturcon thinks to himself.  "The situation on this planet 
is way out of control.  All these transformers just being here can 
distrub the timeline.  It's time to take action, Fracturcn 
MAXIMIZE."  With his blazing speed no sooner has the transmetal 
finished going into robot mode then he gets 4 shots off at Tigerhawk 
& Liono, from a 200 yard distance.  Fracturcon is intent on not 
letting these two make it to the Arc.....
